title: Textile
medium:
Medium: Silk and metallic
Technique: Predominately warp-faced plain weave (blue) faced with a continuous supplementary weft (narrow strips of gold metallic foil wound on top yellow silk)
-From Lace Exhibition, August 3 - November 7, 1982
